column4: Hello. I was wondering why jpg's do not open when you double click on them (in fact they bring up a warning) but jpeg's do work correctly. Also, how can i fix it for jpg's
I was wondering if anyone could tell me how to get gThumb or EoG to work with .jpg instead of just .jpeg
i have >200 images from a trip and i don't want to rename ALL of them
Actually, it would not be difficult to rename all of them--but you shouldn't have to.
how can i avoid it -- in EoG and gThumb it just looks as if the 200 some odd pictures do not even exist because of the .jpg... If i rename some to .jpeg they show up
Sorry, I don't know the answer to your question, but I agree that the apps should recognize the .jpg extension.
how would you rename them all easily?
thanks man i will try that
If you're nervous, you should create a few .jpg files in /tmp and test it first.
i made a copy of the image folder  cuz i was nervous actually :-) trying it now
can you send that command again? i lost it when liek a million ppl signed off and on of the channel
I'm still pissssssed that shit doesn't work with .jpgs though, but this will do :-D
